title: shrI kamalAmbikE
sahitya:
shrI kamalAmbikE shrI kamalAmbA nA cinta dIrca (vE amba) vE vEgamE rAvE


anupallavi

  pAkari mukha suranuta pAda nAtO vAdA
				(svara sAhityam)
nA pAdAbjamE gati lOkulaku nikhila sAkSi sutuni brOva ninnu vinA
evarilalOna nijamuga paliki nA nidi nigamAgama nuta rAvE 


caraNam 1    karuNA jalanidhi dharalO ninnu vin gati evarunnArani caraNamu goliciti nA sadA smaraNamu 
jEya kumAruni karuNinci brOva samayamu niratamuga shrI velayupura nivAsini bhava mOcani gAdA
